about_the_game:
A Premium Viewing Experience

Enjoy movie theater quality with stunning 4K Ultra HD and 8K video playback.

Enhanced Blu-ray & DVD Playback

Enjoy a cinema-like experience from the comfort of your home.

The Most Comprehensive Media Playback Solution

Now featuring a completely redesigned user interface and new AI tools.

All Major Formats Supported

Watch your favorite content in virtually any format.

PowerDVD, Reimagined

Discover our completely redesigned user interface with a more user-friendly media management hub.

Your Movies, Your Way

Organize your media with customizable thumbnails, poster walls, and AI-powered photo management.

Breathe New Life into Your Favorite Movies and Videos

Turn your living room into a home theater with our patented TrueTheater technology.

TrueTheater

Watch your movies like never before with deeper colors and enhanced video/audio playback.

Studio-Quality Audio

Get the most out of your home theater system with DTS-HD, Dolby Audio, and Hi-Res 7.1 surround sound.

Your Personal Digital Media Hub

PowerDVD is the most robust and versatile solution for all your entertainment needs.

Experience YouTube Without Any Interruptions

Watch your favorite YouTube videos offline and uninterrupted in up to 8K quality.

Cast to TV or Streaming Devices

Play your media on the big screen or your favorite devices in the best available quality.
detailed_description:
A Premium Viewing Experience

Enjoy movie theater quality with stunning 4K Ultra HD and 8K video playback.

Enhanced Blu-ray & DVD Playback

Enjoy a cinema-like experience from the comfort of your home.

The Most Comprehensive Media Playback Solution

Now featuring a completely redesigned user interface and new AI tools.

All Major Formats Supported

Watch your favorite content in virtually any format.

PowerDVD, Reimagined

Discover our completely redesigned user interface with a more user-friendly media management hub.

Your Movies, Your Way

Organize your media with customizable thumbnails, poster walls, and AI-powered photo management.

Breathe New Life into Your Favorite Movies and Videos

Turn your living room into a home theater with our patented TrueTheater technology.

TrueTheater

Watch your movies like never before with deeper colors and enhanced video/audio playback.

Studio-Quality Audio

Get the most out of your home theater system with DTS-HD, Dolby Audio, and Hi-Res 7.1 surround sound.

Your Personal Digital Media Hub

PowerDVD is the most robust and versatile solution for all your entertainment needs.

Experience YouTube Without Any Interruptions

Watch your favorite YouTube videos offline and uninterrupted in up to 8K quality.

Cast to TV or Streaming Devices

Play your media on the big screen or your favorite devices in the best available quality.
ext_user_account_notice: Account required at membership.cyberlink.com to use the streaming and sharing features.
legal_notice: © 2022 and developed by Cyberlink Corporation. Published by Koch Media GmbH, Austria. Koch Media and its respective logos are trademarks of Koch Media GmbH. PowerDVD, CyberLink and their respective logo are trademarks of CyberLink Corporation. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
name: CyberLink PowerDVD 22 Ultra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 7 (64 bit OS only)
  • Processor: Intel 7th Generation Core i7 (Kaby Lake) with HD (UHD) Graphics 630.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: To view High Dynamic Range (HDR) effects from HDR10 Videos, Intel 7th Generation (Kaby Lake) Core i Processors integrated with Intel HD Graphics 630 or Intel Iris Graphics 640, AMD Radeon RX 400 series; RX 500 Series; RX Vega Series, and NVIDIA GTX 950/960, 1000 series (for HEVC HDR 10), RTX 2000 series, GTX 1080 Ti, GTX 1050, GTX 1050 Ti, or GT 1030 (for VP9 HDR 10).
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only. Keyboard and mouse required
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required for program activation, file format activation, and other online services.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:

short_description: PowerDVD 22 - The World's #1 Blu-ray & Media PlayerPowerDVD is more than just a Blu-ray and DVD player – it's an all-in-one, premium multimedia app that allows you to get the most out of your viewing experience.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
